name: Pegasus International Hotel

reviews.text: This hotel gets better and better. Not only is this a fantastic location right on Duval, but the staff/customer service is always top notch welcoming and friendly. The recently renovated rooms are beautiful, clean and comfortable. Pool and deck are the perfect size. Great hotel for all. Been staying here every year for 7 years and they make you feel like family. Will come back every year!
reviews.title: Have been and will come back every year!!

reviews.text: i enjoyed my self so much tht i had to call my friends ad iunvited them to come with me the next time.the hotel was clean,the bed were comfortable and we partied all night and wallked home easily because they have a good a location; the staff wass pleasant and the roof top pool and jacuzzy was the hightligh.there was parking for my car and pool side bar that had exotic indian delicios food. and we will be back.
reviews.title: the best place of key west'

reviews.text: great place to stay! right in the middle of duval st. on corner of southard! new pool! I will always go back! great prices and people!
reviews.title: Love this Hotel! Nathan Sailors

reviews.text: It is located in the heart of the action on Duval Street. Since parking is almost non-existent downtown, the parking lot alone is worth the price of the hotel. I would stay there again.
reviews.title: Location is everything

reviews.text: We have stayed at The Pegasus Hotel several times over the past 5-6 years, and we look forward to our visit once or twice per year. We have always been very, very pleased with our accommodations and have come to find that it is the best place to stay on Key West.
reviews.title: fun in the sun!!!

reviews.text: I would recommend this hotel to all my friends and family we came to key west to get away and thats what we did. duval st was alot of fun and we could always find something to do. next time we come to key west we will definitely stay at the pegasus.
reviews.title: very clean hotel, awesome location, offstreet parking, and helpfull staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We've stayed at the Pegasus Hotel 6 or 7 times now. The location is perfect, right in the middle of Duvall Street. You can walk to everything. Restaurants, nightlife, shopping, even the beach. The rooms are very clean and very spacious, with a microwave and refrigerator. The pool/deck area is great with lots of privacy. The hotel staff is always very friendly and helpful. There is also a shuttle to/from the airport. It is also very reasonably priced, making it a great deal for the great location. We've recommended it to lots of friends who also loved it. We don't even look for other places to stay now, we automatically make reservations at The Pegasus.
reviews.title: Excellent

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in the Pegasus over the Thanksgiving holiday and it was excellent. The rooms were clean, well equiped, and nicely decorated. The location was excellent and even included free parking which is signifcant in Key West. Our stay was so enjoyable that we are going back again this week. We enjoyed being able to look out our window and observe the activity on Duval Street. It was also great to be able to walk to countless restaurants, bars and activities. As they say, "it's location, location, location."
reviews.title: This is a charming hotel ideally located

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I were greeted warmly and courteously on our arrival.
reviews.title: Great location-great value-the flavor of Key West in a nutshell!

reviews.text: Our room was very clean and comfortable. What a great value! We found ourselves in
reviews.title: Best Value and Location in Key West.

reviews.text: This hotel is close to everything. Staff was very helpful. Everything was very clean and neat. Outside spa is great. Check in was smooth and easy. Check out was the same. We also enjoyed the pool.
reviews.title: great place in key west loved it

reviews.text: Myself and 2 buddies recently went to Key West for a diving trip. We made reservations at Pegasus International and what a great find. Right in the heart of the dwn twn. Walking distance to everything. Clean rooms w a frig (just in case u need a cool one by the pool or hot tub). Large sun deck on the second story. Friendly staff and a small but pretty lobby w just enough extras for sale to make your stay more enjoyable (snacks, pop, etc). I will be booking my next visit to Key West at the Pegasus I..
reviews.title: What a Great Place to stay!

reviews.text: Spent the weekend in Key West with friends and found the Pegasus was a excellent place to stay. Rooms were clean and recently remodeled, location was within walking distance to stores, clubs and attractions of Key West. Park the car and leave it! I recommend to Pegasus and I will stay there again.
reviews.title: Excellent location, great place to say in Key West

reviews.text: I was recently invited on a trip with a company out of Detroit Mi. NuWay Construction. We were informed that our time in Key West we would be accommodated by the Pegasus International Hotel. Upon our arrival we were greeted and assigned rooms by a very friendly and professional staff. Having stayed in Key West before I was a little apprehensive about checking into my room but discovered all my expectations were to be proven wrong. The rooms were very clean and the bathrooms had previously been updated and remodeled. The outside of the hotel had a very clean pool and Jacuzzi area. There was even a poolside bar .For the price it was perfect. The Hotel property was centrally located on Duvall St. which made a three day trip easy and enjoyable. You can bring the family or just friends. Keep up the good work Pegasus
reviews.title: Well Worth the price, I would stay again.

reviews.text: I stayed at the Pegasus International Hotel for a weekend getaway with some of my friends and the experience was nothing less than fabulous. First and foremost the location of the Pegasus is ideal, being right on Duval St. and within walking to distance to all of the must see attractions of Key West including dining, shopping, and nightlife. The rooftop pool was the perfect way to spend a relaxing day away from the hustle and bustle of the beach. I was more than satisfied with the room, it was very clean and aesthetically decorated, and the room rates were considerably more reasonable than other hotels on Duval. The staff was friendly and accommodating. The Pegasus offered everything I was looking for in a hotel and more.
reviews.title: Excellent

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed 4 days ~ it was our honeymoon plus there was a group we traveled with. We all stayed at the Pegasus. It was great. The lobby is tiny, but there is a desk to check in at then you head up to your room. We were on the 2nd floor, right near the stairs and the pool. Most importantly the Pegasus Hotel is located on Duval St. right in the middle of everything, so you literally walk out the door into all the action =) Which was perfect for us. During the day we'd get up and walk all around the island, at night we'd hit the bars with friends & enjoy the nightlife and not have to worry about a taxi or driving. This was the best vacation I've had yet & can't wait to visit Key West again, I would def. recommend the Pegasus Hotel & hope to stay there again in the future.
reviews.title: small but nice hotel, amazing location

reviews.text: I had a wonderful experience at the Pegasus International Hotel that enhanced my fun experience at Key West. The hotel is located on the main Duval Street and you couldn't ask for a better spot! The hotel is a stone's throw away from all the restaurants, bars, shopping and the fun that one associates with Key West. The staff at the hotel were helpful and the rooms were clean and well kept. There is a swimming pool in the premises to add to the experience. I have traveled in the last 12 months to Dubai, Kerala, Turkey and this trip to Key West was THE fun trip of 2010! Would surely come back and stay at the Pegasus International...
reviews.title: Amazing location right in the centre of all the fun...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is a very clean hotel, great location, staff very helpful. They accomodate any request.Definitely recommend this to anyone who travels to Key West & wants to be in the center of everything. Can't wait to go back!!
reviews.title: Great value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: we spent a fantastic time at the pegasus! we're reap travelers to key west, and have spent are time in other hotels, but we keep coming back! you can't beat the location,convenience,or hospitality anywhere! thank you pegasus, cheryl and carrie from melbourne, florida.
reviews.title: A+ hospitality

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This was our fifth vacation stay at this hotel, and each year the place gets better and better! No ... it's not very fancy, and the bathrooms are a little cramped, but what it is, is quite clean, with a pleasant and accommodating staff, free Continental breakfast, a guest parking lot, free in-room Internet, frig, microwave, an outdoor pool, and most important, it is outstandingly well located right on famous Duval Street and next door to a 24/7 Walgreen's, This is a European style tourist hotel, with a fun kick. And the price we paid was very reasonable, allowing us to enjoy more of Key West's attractions. We will return for our sixth year, and recommend this establishment for a economical, clean, safe and perfectly located place to stay in old Key West.
reviews.title: Our Fifth Great Stay At This Place ... Be Back For A Sixth!

description: The Pegasus International Hotel is a charming Art Deco hotel located in the heart of Key West. Many activities, popular sites, restaurants, shopping, bars and clubs are within a short walking distance. Thirty newly renovated rooms offer modern comfort such as cable TV, phone with data port, free wireless internet, air conditioning, refrigerators, microwaves, and irons with ironing boards. Also, our rooftop sundeck with a heated outdoor pool and jacuzzi offers views of the bustling Southard and Duval Streets. Spice Lounge is the hotel’s onsite, poolside tapas bar featuring a unique Indian Tapas menu and excellent drink selection. Parking is available for all guests at a flat rate. Shuttles from the airport and ferry are also available upon request. Limited room service is also available from various local restaurants.Activities nearby include diving, snorkeling, fishing, city tours, golf, pirate tours and pub crawls, Dry Tortugas National Park, Fort Jefferson Ferry, The Key West Butterfly & Nature Conservatory, Key West Seaplane Adventures,Jimmy Buffett's Margaritaville, Sloppy Joe’s Bar, Mallory Square, Fort Zachary Taylor Beach, The Hemingway House, bars, nightlife, clubs, shopping, restaurants and more.
